Body:
new_measure = 0.1
old_measure = 0.1
direction = 'higher'
threshold = 0.0001
assert misc.check_convergence(new_measure, old_measure, direction, threshold)
new_measure = 0.101
old_measure = 0.1
direction = 'higher'
threshold = 0.0001
assert misc.check_convergence(new_measure, old_measure, direction, threshold
    ) is False
new_measure = 0.101
old_measure = 0.1
direction = 'lower'
threshold = 0.0001
assert misc.check_convergence(new_measure, old_measure, direction, threshold)
new_measure = 0.09
old_measure = 0.1
direction = 'lower'
threshold = 0.0001
assert misc.check_convergence(new_measure, old_measure, direction, threshold
    ) is False
